"A.P.242/3/3/10:00": "Xiao!"
"Hey Xiera, long time no see. Looks like you've got a handle on things."
"You've got a lot of nerve saying that after the stunt you pulled! But... I'm glad you're okay!"
"Yeah. You held up well."
"Xiao..."
"Even Ulc showed up. Were you that worried about me?"
"Yowch!"
"Wha-, Ulc!"
"It's not a laughing matter... I really was worried about you."
"It wasn't just Xiera. Me and everyone else... All of us were worried about you."
"So don't you think there's something you should say to us all first?"
"...You're right. I'm sorry for worrying you all."
"And... Thank you, for all your concern."

"I apologize for what I put you through. But it's thanks to that that I'm now linked up with
Kamits, and can get a read on the Photoners."
"This is... The formation of the enemy's forces!"
"Their constant surprise attacks have made them a menace, but I'm putting an end to that. It's time for us to make a stand, and fight back."

"Xiera, I'm gonna need your help just a little
longer."
"Yes!"
"Alright, that means we've got work to do too! Come on, Theo!"
"Mount a Counterattack"
"Turning the Tables"
